SprinklerWorkbench.text: Um, Hello...^You might have some older sprinklers laying about, that you don't know what to do with.^Instead of throwing them away, you might want to try upgrading them.^^Here's a blueprint for a workbench, that might help you with that.^^Hope you find it usefull^-Clint
SprinklerWorkbench.title: Sprinkler Workbench Recipe
